title: student_Juan_Melton
text:
Name: Juan Melton.
Graduation Year: 2021.
Description: Juan Melton is a dedicated Data Science student with a strong passion for innovation and learning. Throughout their academic journey, they have gained experience in data science research and practical applications. They aspire to become an environmental scientist working on conservation projects. Their dedication to excellence and problem-solving skills make them a promising professional in their field..
